mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure that images and buttons scale appropriately on smaller devices and improve touch responsiveness for ease of use.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize images and minify JavaScript and CSS files to reduce loading time.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve meta descriptions, alt text for images, and integrate structured data for better SEO ranking.
userExperienceTip: Enhance accessibility features like text size options and better contrast for readability.
tips: Consider implementing a chatbot for customer support.
